title: Okay i got banned, i need insight.
body:
Today i got chat banned, and i need some rioter or the community help to understand what was bannable because i don't really see a problem with my behaviour since i tried to state as much facts as possible, so help me out here are the logs.

Dorme Ornimus: and don't fight bda fights earlier on

Dorme Ornimus: fyi
Dorme Ornimus: that's data
Dorme Ornimus: raw facts

Post-Game
Dorme Ornimus: i always love
Dorme Ornimus: when a mage
Dorme Ornimus: rapes
Dorme Ornimus: a galio
Dorme Ornimus: :3

so help me out point out the negative statements (btw this doesn't have context because riot didn't gave it to me,if you say this is negative and has context, i'll try to put some context as a comment) but i want a behavioural analysis

replies.body:
Game one, it seems like it was a two way thing, Thresh was likely flaming you so you flames back in a passive aggressive way simply to try to piss him off.


Game 2 you were just straight up flaming Galio, like he was 0/3, he knows he was doing poorly, you don’t need to telling him and grind it in that he is doing poorly, there is no reason to do that kind of thing besides pissing off your allies.

game 1, you're absolutely right, i was trying to piss him off the same way he tried to piss me off.

game 2, galio was flamming way worse, he hasn't been banned yet, or at least to my knowledge no one has been banned from my reports in the short term, he didn't know he was doing poorly, he was raging at us, constantly, raging everyone else but himself.

And another great example why riot needs to give context on this backlogs, it doesn't really help a lot to se if it was a proper banning, anyway i suppose i don't deserve the ban based on my experience in the game, since i was retaliating most of the time, nevertheless i was somewhat of annoying and i understand that but, if this system is based on an AI looking for words, and sintaxis we're on a really bad shit.

> [{quoted}](name=Dorme Ornimus,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KxNFxQ59,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-05-24T23:43:02.235+0000)
>
> game 2, galio was flamming way worse, he hasn't been banned yet, or at least to my knowledge no one has been banned from my reports in the short term, he didn't know he was doing poorly, he was raging at us, constantly, raging everyone else but himself.

Ok, then why not just mute him and play then instead of wasting time flaming him cutting down your chance of winning?

Do remember that flaming doesn’t just hurt you, or your opponent, it hurts your whole team including the other three trying to win:

> And another great example why riot needs to give context on this backlogs, it doesn't really help a lot to se if it was a proper banning

What is there to not understand though, you know flaming is wrong and know that insulting your allies can get you in trouble.

>anyway i suppose i don't deserve the ban based on my experience in the game, since i was retaliating most of the time

Two wrongs don’t make a right and just like real life if you get in a fight with someone, both of you are getting in trouble.

>nevertheless i was somewhat of annoying and i understand that but, if this system is based on an AI looking for words, and sintaxis we're on a really bad shit.

This is just false or at least partly false, the game will punish you for bad words but only if what you say is really really bad, like only if what you say is homophobic or racist.

The reason you got a punishment is because you display a pattern of this kind of behavior and the last set of reports was the straw that broke the camel’s back to get you punished.

Main thing I see here is that you repeatedly berated a teammate who was playing poorly. One comment was enough - constantly doing it is just harassment. You did this in both games.

If a teammate is bad, don't argue with them to try to prove they are bad. It won't accomplish anything except to make them more belligerent and uncooperative.

I see your point but when they constantly harass you back even when proven wrong it's really annoying, i also mute a lot of people but sometimes that is anti competitive since i'm not comunicating enought, but again, this is why i think we need the full log, will try to do less berating... but riot needs to improve giving us context.

Yeah I feel for you, unfortunately Riot expects us to behave well even in the face of complete barbarians. Context doesn't matter to Riot, at least for now.

One other thing to consider is that a teammate who is flaming you is doing it because they want a response or acknowledgement from you, if you can stand it without replying or if you can mute them then they will give up on it eventually because they will realize that it's not going to work. Alternatively when you respond you're kind of feeding the behavior. This is why - Riot's rules aside - you are better off not engaging with flamers in chat.

The issue is that you are fighting fire with fire. When you encounter someone flaming you should mute them, report them at the end of the game, and move on. Instead you decided to flame them back which makes the game an even worse experience than it already is.

You flamed and were punished for it. Them being the ones that started it doesn't make it ok.
you were flaming a lot, i suggest you to reform now that you can, i've seen people getting permbanned for much less
dorme why don't you read out loud your chatlog then practice what you preach to others in it to yourself only.

You were literally flaming.

People like you need to be punished at some point just to realize what you're doing wrong.

I mean, that kind of already happened, hence why they are here. This sort of comment would have been warranted before they got punished but now that they have you'd be better off explaining why what they did was wrong, because if they came here asking about it then they must not understand.

rape is not fun
Fucking sickening.

Exactly, rape is not fun, nor was that game, nor was that galio going full ap full in, and "Rape also means to damage or destroy something by using it in an unsuitable way" https://dictionary.cambridge.org/dictionary/english/rape in american english.
You were saying mean things about Thresh, and you kind of were saying someone did a "stupid" engage..

okay i will type less if that bothers my teammates tough they can always mute, also i'm not typing as much as my teammates are, but since the log doesn't give enought information you don't have a way of knowing.
Thanks for the tip.
Yea type less and play better. That's about it.

sad part is i was perfoming okay in both games, in the first one i was carrying we also won, playing as kaisa, but thresh my support raged the entire game i was retaliating he raging everyone then me... this makes me think there's a problem with the log being like this, it lacks information, the galio you're 0/3 and so on was about galio raging because we didn't follow him to death, several times...
but again this is all my word vs theirs and again this log is not sufficient to make me think i did the wrong thing because there's a context to every message i sent but i see your point, type less so less communication of intent = win
